name: SFZ Sample Definition File
summary: Audio sample definition file saved in the SFZ format and used to define instruments; contains opcodes that define audio sample attributes, such as their map location across a standard MIDI keyboard and how notes will respond to velocity; also includes the default path used to locate the collection of samples, most likely .WAV , .AIFF , .MP3 , .OGG , or .FLAC files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
